Grieving husband on wife Jo Sione-Lauaki’s ‘unexplained’ death on Northland beach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/ Cherie Howie"She sent me a text that said, ‘Help’", Jared Sione-Lauaki says of wife Jo's final message Sat, 03 Aug 2024 09:01:24 +0000 Jo Sione-Lauaki, pictured with her husband Jared Sione-Lauaki. Jo was found dead on Omamari Beach in Northland on Friday in circumstances police have described as "unexplained". Jared has spoken to the Herald about the death of his wife and the mother of their eight kids.

Sat, 03 Aug 2024 06:03:15 +0000 Two people have died and one person is missing after a boat capsized near the Riverton bar.
Prisoner Huata Irving ingested meth bag, after being allowed out for tangi, which later burst inside him https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ Belinda FeekJudge tells Huata Irving, who was hospitalised, he's the “author of his own misfortune". Quick-thinking driver alerts police to dangerous speeder, preventing potential tragedy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/quick-thinking-driver-alerts-police-to-dangerous-speeder-preventing-pottial-tragedy/7MIMUM5SXBC63KB6MGLLOU4L4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/quick-thinking-driver-alerts-police-to-dangerous-speeder-preventing-pottial-tragedy/7MIMUM5SXBC63KB6MGLLOU4L4Q/ “I didn’t quite believe it when I saw the speed on the radar, I thought ‘is that right?'" Five rescued from capsized boat in Manukau Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-rescued-from-capsized-boat-in-manukau-harbour/WKAD33A3NZC2BJSJU4UJXLS36Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-rescued-from-capsized-boat-in-manukau-harbour/WKAD33A3NZC2BJSJU4UJXLS36Y/ Coastguard and police attended the incident near Puketutu Island this morning. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 03:02:01 +0000 'Early this morning, our team responded to an urgent call for assistance from Police . Five individuals were found in the water with their boat having capsized in the Manukau Harbour. With the support of the Police Eagle helicopter, the airport hovercraft, and Lensesonline Rescue, we were able to successfully bring everyone to safety. We'd like to extend our gratitude to all the assisting units for their swift and professional response. Remember, safety on the water is paramount. Always ensure your equipment is in good condition and stay alert to changing conditions. Stay safe out there!'... Photo / Facebook / Papakura Coastguard
